perfumes.name: Chanel No. 5
perfumes.notes: Aldehydes, Ylang-Ylang, Neroli, Jasmine, Rose, Sandalwood, Vanilla
perfumes.description: The timeless classic floral-aldehyde fragrance created by Ernest Beaux in 1921.

perfumes.name: Sauvage
perfumes.notes: Bergamot, Pepper, Lavender, Pink Pepper, Vetiver, Patchouli, Ambroxan
perfumes.description: A fresh, spicy, and woody fragrance that embodies wildness and elegance.

perfumes.name: Black Opium
perfumes.notes: Coffee, Vanilla, White Flowers, Pear, Pink Pepper, Orange Blossom
perfumes.description: A bold and addictive gourmand floral fragrance with coffee and vanilla accords.

perfumes.name: Acqua di Gio
perfumes.notes: Marine Notes, Bergamot, Neroli, Jasmine, Rosemary, Patchouli, Amber
perfumes.description: A fresh aquatic fragrance inspired by the sea, sun and earth of Pantelleria.

perfumes.name: La Vie Est Belle
perfumes.notes: Iris, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Praline, Vanilla, Patchouli, Tonka Bean
perfumes.description: A gourmand floral fragrance celebrating happiness and femininity.

perfumes.name: Bleu de Chanel
perfumes.notes: Citrus, Mint, Pink Pepper, Ginger, Nutmeg, Sandalwood, Cedar, Amber
perfumes.description: A woody aromatic fragrance that represents freedom and boldness.

perfumes.name: Light Blue
perfumes.notes: Sicilian Lemon, Apple, Cedar, Bamboo, Jasmine, White Rose, Amber
perfumes.description: A fresh and vibrant Mediterranean-inspired fragrance.

perfumes.name: One Million
perfumes.notes: Blood Mandarin, Grapefruit, Mint, Rose, Cinnamon, Spice Notes, Leather, Amber
perfumes.description: A bold, spicy, and woody fragrance with a sparkling freshness.

perfumes.name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
perfumes.notes: Black Truffle, Ylang-Ylang, Bergamot, Black Currant, Orchid, Spice Notes, Patchouli
perfumes.description: A luxurious and sensual fragrance with rich floral and dark notes.

perfumes.name: Creed Aventus
perfumes.notes: Bergamot, Black Currant, Pineapple, Apple, Birch, Patchouli, Musk
perfumes.description: A sophisticated and fruity fragrance with woody undertones, perfect for all.

perfumes.name: Le Labo Santal 33
perfumes.notes: Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Cardamom, Iris, Violet, Ambroxan
perfumes.description: A unisex fragrance with a smoky, woody, and spicy blend.

perfumes.name: Byredo Gypsy Water
perfumes.notes: Juniper Berries, Lemon, Pepper, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber
perfumes.description: A fresh, woody fragrance with citrus and peppery notes.

perfumes.name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540
perfumes.notes: Jasmine, Saffron, Cedarwood, Ambergris, Fir Resin
perfumes.description: A rich and complex fragrance with floral and resinous undertones.

perfumes.name: Diptyque Philosykos
perfumes.notes: Fig Tree, Fig Leaves, White Cedarwood, Green Notes
perfumes.description: A fresh and green fragrance that evokes the essence of a fig tree.

perfumes.name: Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt
perfumes.notes: Ambrette Seed, Red Algae, Grapefruit, Sea Salt, Sage
perfumes.description: A fresh, oceanic fragrance that evokes the spirit of the sea.

perfumes.name: Acqua di Parma Colonia
perfumes.notes: Citrus Fruits, Lavender, Rosemary, Verbena, Patchouli
perfumes.description: A fresh and elegant citrus-based fragrance with a hint of florals.
